channel.title: Bluegrass and mountains
channel.description:
Recordings of and talk about a wide variety of old time American music.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Old time music of historical interest
item.description: This program focuses on songs that tell stories of historical interest from the turn of the 20th century.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: The repetition of melodies in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the repetition of melodies in old time music
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Mandolin in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the mandolin and its role in old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Work songs in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the work songs that were a part of old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Old time religious music
item.description: This program focuses on the various types of religious music that are a part of old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Spirituals (Songs)

item.title: The railroad in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on old time songs that centered on the railroad.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Old-timey recordings of Dr. Edward Mellon
item.description: This program features a variety of recordings from the collection of Dr. Edward Mellon, a faculty member at the University of Michigan with an interest in old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Banjo and fiddle in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the banjo and the fiddle, as well as their roles in old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Old time songs of idealized romance
item.description: This program focuses on old time songs that tell stories of idealized romance.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Guitar in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the guitar and its role in old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Introduction to old time music
item.description: This program gives an introduction to the types of music that are explored in the series.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Autoharp in old time music
item.description: This program focuses on the autoharp and its role in old time music.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts

item.title: Old time songs of tragic romance
item.description: This program focuses on old time songs that tell stories of tragic romance.
item.dc:creator: Fidell, S. A. (Sanford A.)
item.dc:subject: Performing Arts
